overview: Dalavere tells the story of Baybars and Münir, who are dragged into a challenging adventure to find their stolen cars. Baybars is a young man who lives his life with cunning. Together with his brother-in-law Münir, he runs a car rental company in Zeytinburnu. One day the stealing of Münir's car causes both of their lives to change. Trying to find the stolen car, the couple are dragged from Istanbul to Bodrum after thieves. Baybars and Münir, who want to teach a big lesson to the thieves, are caught between a swap between two mafia groups without even realizing it. What happened to them is not limited to this. When they become aware of their involvement in the mafia, they also cause many mistakes in the hotel. Baybars and his brother-in-law Münir, who tried to get rid of their troubles,
title: Dalavere
